detail_desc: Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with one button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Pyjama shorts in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Skirt in an airy, checked viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist.
Skirt in an airy, checked viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs.
Short, gently flared skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back and a high waist with a decorative metal buckle at the front.
Short, gently flared skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back and a high waist with a decorative metal buckle at the front.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a zip on one side. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Twill cap with reversible sequins on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Soft velour slippers with embroidery and appliqués, elastication around the opening and a small loop at the back. Velour linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated, ribbed waistband, fake side pockets, flap leg pockets and ribbed hems.
Dress in tulle decorated with shimmering sequins. Short, flounced sleeves, an opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Short, V-neck dress in an embroidered viscose weave with a small stand-up collar with ties. Long balloon sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and wide skirt. Unlined.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.

Jacket in thick pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a pile front and padded mesh back. Zip at the top, zipped outer compartment and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Two mesh inner compartments. Lined. Size 8x15x30 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
